snippet: The annual NYC Winter Jazzfest went gloriously big for its 10th anniversary, stretching to five days rather than the usual two, and reaching a total audience of 7,500.
abstract: Nate Chinen describes some performances at NYC Winter Jazzfest, which has gotten much bigger for its 10th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: The annual NYC Winter Jazzfest went gloriously big for its 10th anniversary, stretching to five days rather than the usual two, and reaching a total audience of 7,500.

headline.print_headline: Favorites and Discoveries Among a Superabundance of Jazz
headline.seo: NYC Winter Jazzfest Celebrates Its 10th Anniversary
headline.main: Favorites and Discoveries Among a Superabundance of Jazz
